name: Softline
description: Softline provides "end-to-end" solutions to its customers, through its Technical Advisory teams; commercial and consulting services and support, pillars on which guarantees the choice, the best way of acquisition, and putting in operation and maintenance of the technology most appropriate to the specific needs of each client, using best practices as SAM (Software Asset Management), ISO 19770-1, etc. Both with Premise (in the client's own offices) and in the Cloud (Cloud Computing).
